00029 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00030 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00031 from PyQt4.uic import *
00032 
00033 from Koo.Common import Api
00034 from Koo.Common import Common
00035 from Koo import Rpc
00036 
00037 from Koo.Screen.Screen import Screen
00038 from Koo.Model.Group import RecordGroup
00039 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldWidget import *
00040 from Koo.Fields.AbstractFieldDelegate import *
00041 from Koo.Dialogs.SearchDialog import SearchDialog
00042 
00043 (ManyToManyFieldWidgetUi, ManyToManyFieldWidgetBase ) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('many2many.ui') ) 
00044 
00045 class ManyToManyFieldWidget(AbstractFieldWidget, ManyToManyFieldWidgetUi):
00046         def __init__(self, parent, model, attrs={}):
00047                 AbstractFieldWidget.__init__(self, parent, model, attrs)
00048                 ManyToManyFieldWidgetUi.__init__(self)
00049                 self.setupUi(self)
00050 
00051                 self.setSizePolicy( QSizePolicy.Expanding, QSizePolicy.Expanding )
00052 
00053                 self.colors['normal'] = self.palette().color( self.backgroundRole() )   
00054                 
00055                 self.connect( self.pushAdd, SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.add )
00056                 self.connect( self.pushRemove, SIGNAL( "clicked()"), self.remove )
00057                 self.connect( self.uiText, SIGNAL( 'returnPressed()' ), self.add )
00058 
00059                 group = RecordGroup( attrs['relation'] )
00060                 group.setAllowRecordLoading( False )
00061                 
00062                 self.screen = Screen( self )
00063                 self.screen.setRecordGroup( group )
00064                 self.screen.setViewTypes( ['tree'] )
00065                 self.screen.setEmbedded( True )
00066                 self.connect( self.screen, SIGNAL('activated()'), self.open )
00067 
00068                 layout = self.layout()
00069                 layout.insertWidget( 1, self.screen )
00070                 self.installPopupMenu( self.uiText )
00071                 self.old = None
00072 
00073         def open( self ):
00074                 if not self.screen.currentRecord():
00075                         return
00076                 id = self.screen.currentRecord().id 
00077                 if not id:
00078                         return
00079                 Api.instance.createWindow(False, self.attrs['relation'], id, [], 'form', mode='form,tree')      
00080         
00081         def sizeHint( self ):
00082                 return QSize( 200,800 )
00083 
00084         def add(self):
00085                 # As the 'add' button modifies the model we need to be sure all other fields/widgets
00086                 # have been stored in the model. Otherwise the recordChanged() triggered 
00087                 # could make us lose changes.
00088                 self.view.store()
00089 
00090                 domain = self.record.domain( self.name )
00091                 context = self.record.fieldContext( self.name )
00092 
00093                 ids = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.attrs['relation'], 'name_search', unicode( self.uiText.text()), domain, 'ilike', context, False)
00094                 ids = [x[0] for x in ids] 
00095                 if len(ids) != 1:
00096                         dialog = SearchDialog(self.attrs['relation'], sel_multi=True, ids=ids)
00097                         if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00098                                 return
00099                         ids = dialog.result
00100 
00101                 self.screen.load(ids)
00102                 self.screen.display()
00103                 self.uiText.clear()
00104                 # Manually set the current model and field as modified
00105                 # This is not necessary in case of removing an item. 
00106                 # Maybe a better option should be found. But this one works just right.
00107                 self.screen.group.recordChanged( None )
00108                 self.screen.group.recordModified( None )
00109 
00110         def remove(self):
00111                 # As the 'remove' button modifies the model we need to be sure all other fields/widgets
00112                 # have been stored in the model. Otherwise the recordChanged() triggered 
00113                 # could make us lose changes.
00114                 self.view.store()
00115                 self.screen.remove()
00116                 self.screen.display()
00117 
00118         def setReadOnly(self, ro):
00119                 self.uiText.setEnabled( not ro )
00120                 self.pushAdd.setEnabled( not ro )
00121                 self.pushRemove.setEnabled( not ro )
00122 
00123         def clear(self):
00124                 self.uiText.setText('')
00125                 self.screen.setRecordGroup( None )      
00126                 self.screen.display()
00127 
00128         def showValue(self):
00129                 group = self.record.value(self.name)
00130                 self.screen.setRecordGroup(group)
00131                 self.screen.display()
00132 
00133         # We do not store anything here as elements are added and removed in the
00134         # Screen (self.screen). The only thing we need to take care of (as noted 
00135         # above) is to ensure that the model and field are marked as modified.
00136         def store(self):
00137                 pass
00138 
00139 class ManyToManyFieldDelegate( AbstractFieldDelegate ):
00140         def setModelData(self, editor, kooModel, index):
00141                 if unicode( editor.text() ) == unicode( index.data( Qt.DisplayRole ).toString() ):
00142                         return
00143                 # We expecte a KooModel here
00144                 model = kooModel.recordFromIndex( index )
00145 
00146                 #model.setData( index, QVariant( editor.currentText() ), Qt.EditRole )
00147                 domain = model.domain( self.name )
00148                 context = model.fieldContext( self.name )
00149 
00150                 ids = Rpc.session.execute('/object', 'execute', self.attributes['relation'], 'name_search', unicode( editor.text() ), domain, 'ilike', context, False)
00151                 ids = [x[0] for x in ids] 
00152                 if len(ids) != 1:
00153                         dialog = SearchDialog(self.attributes['relation'], sel_multi=True, ids=ids)
00154                         if dialog.exec_() == QDialog.Rejected:
00155                                 return
00156                         ids = dialog.result
00157 
00158                 ids = [QVariant(x) for x in ids]
00159                 kooModel.setData( index, QVariant(ids), Qt.EditRole )
